data.title: The Perilous Fight: America's World War II in Color
data.meta_description: Find out how to watch The Perilous Fight: America's World War II in Color. Stream the latest seasons and episodes, watch trailers, and more for The Perilous Fight: America's World War II in Color at TV Guide
data.text:
2003-2011

1 Season

PBS

Documentary

TVPG

Watchlist

World War II is seen in a vividly new light in this overview consisting entirely of color footage, supplemented by readings from letters, speeches and news dispatches. Producer Martin Smith is a 'Frontline' veteran whose producer credits also include the 1983 PBS series 'Vietnam: A Television History' and the 1998 CNN series 'Cold War.'
